markdownRemark.html:
I am going to be giving a presentation on Linq for SQL at the SQL Saturday at the University of North Florida on Saturday May 2nd. This presentation covers the basics on how to use the Language integrated query syntax inside of .NET 3.5.

There a lot of other good presentations that will be given on the SQL Server 2008 platform. SQL Saturday is a free event. Sign up now before registration for the event fills up.

frontmatter.title: SQL Saturday Presentation on Linq for SQL
